Description.SourceString: Currently, it is the only smart servant with an unknown serial number, model, and year of manufacture. Outmoded it may, it is twice as cool as any smart servant here. It is said to be the prototype of all smart servants whose artificial consciousness is based on its Sea of Consciousness. In a sense, its consciousness is closer to humans than any other smart servant's.
编号CBR-63,1号，农业用量产型。旧联邦时期的产物，用于土地开垦和农业种植，智能等级略低，具有多重功能。它可以在各个地区检测土壤，根据土壤的属性来分析可适种的蔬菜。内部可用于分析合成植物营养液用于培植蔬菜，是一个十分便利的农用机械智仆。

Code TGR-31, No.7, Greening type. With unique knowledge and artistic talent for gardening, it was responsible for part of greening work in the city back to the Old Federation period. Once it was a Gardener in Navia Ecological Park. However, its parts now are not as flexible as they used to be, combined with today's environment which gradually incapacitates its original functions. Therefore, it can only complete some simple greening work at present.

Code ABR-62, No.0, not disclosed. One of the first generations of Smart Servant cannot be traced due to its old model type. It is currently a hunting type with feline artificial consciousness and feline biological habits. Although it looks small and cute, it has a powerful combat system, which can be a defensive robot on the battlefield during the initial period of the Omnium plague.

Model FGR-03,1 was a mass production industrial model used in deep excavation during the Old Federation era. It had simple features and was not very intelligent. Later on, it was abandoned due to the reduced mine production and safety concerns. To cut their losses, the manufacturer modified the robot into a smart servant and put it on sale again, and that's how people ended up with this clumsy and cute servant.

Number WMM-64,3 was an amphibious smart servant with a built-in ecology system that can handle environmental changes perfectly. It goes into hibernation mode when the temperature drops below 10 degrees, but is easily awakened due to its sharp ear. However, it doesn't move very fast due to the turtle-like characteristics in its program, so it's not uncommon for its actions to lag behind its thoughts significantly.

Code ARR-02, No.2, Industrial Production type. Though with its intelligence and multi-functions, this smart servant's simple structure is easy to be damaged. It boasts speeding data processing systems and a huge Sea of Consciousness, yet the model is too small to play its full functions. At present, this type of smart servant is mainly for trial and industry.
编号ARF-43,1号，万事型。强大、神秘却十分温和的存在，时刻地关心着自己主人的生活与安危。它在和平的时候可以充当保姆一样的角色，在遇到危险的时候也能作为战斗型智仆使用。但它的算力消耗拖累了整个机体的运行，导致它无法更有效地发挥出自己的全力。目前而言，它只发挥了自己十分之一的实力。

Code ARH-31, No.4, artistic type. With extraordinary artistic consciousness and the talent to create art, it has its own knowledge and understanding of Romanticism. Its temperament is quite gentle, but it sometimes feels blue for any reason on the day of the full moon. Moonrabbit's mind is synchronized with the Gallery. In some way, the Moonrabbit and the Gallery can be considered as a single unit.
